1.5.2.name: wordpress/smooth-slideshow
1.5.2.description: This is a fade slideshow with movable text. after installing this plugin a new content type named slides will be created. you can see on left menu. Add title,content and upload image of your slideshow. This plugin does resize image so please upload image of exact size of your slide show. this slideshow provide face effect on image and text move from right to left;
